messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: INCIDENT REPORT: #PD-6654-KL DATE: 10/05/23  An armed robbery took place at the City National Bank on Elm Street at approximately 3:10 PM. Teller Ms. Kelly Rogers activated the silent alarm upon the robber's demands. RESPONDENTS: (A) SWAT TEAM: Lieutenant A. B. C. Thompson, Sergeant D. E. F. Yates. (B) PATROL: Officer G. H. I. Martinez and Officer J. K. L. Davis. (C) CRIME SCENE UNIT: Technician M. N. O. Reese and Criminalist P. Q. R. Stevens. URGENT: VICTIM SUPPORT & ROBBERY INVESTIGATION UNDERWAY.  Connections are being drawn to a similar incident at Maple Street Credit Union last week. Witnesses included Mr. John Doe (Bank Manager) and Mrs. Emily Gray (Customer). ASSIGN: ROBBERY INVESTIGATION UNIT & VICTIM SUPPORT TEAM.  Upon arrival, Lieutenant Thompson took charge of the situation, ensuring bank customers' safety. Sergeant Yates coordinated with Officer Martinez and Officer Davis to secure the perimeter. Meanwhile, Technician Reese and Criminalist Stevens began gathering evidence. A handwritten note was found, which might provide a lead.  RELEVANT DEPARTMENTS: SWAT TEAM, PATROL, CRIME SCENE UNIT - Lt. Thompson, Sgt. Yates, Officers Martinez & Davis, Technician Reese, Criminalist Stevens. CASE DETAILS: [1] Note Found [2] Bank CCTV Footage [3] Silent Alarm Log [4] Witness Statements. CRIME LOCATION: CITY NATIONAL BANK, 77 Elm Street, Seattle, Washington, 98122. ROBBERY 3:10 PM - REPORTED: Teller Rogers, Lt. Thompson, Sgt. Yates, Officers Martinez and Davis, Technician Reese, Criminalist Stevens PRESENT. File Archived.
